mapper.select: select r.rno, r.grno, r.mile, r.cost, r.liter, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%m-%d') as group_date, g.c_nick, g.effi from refuel r left outer join garage g on r.grno = g.grno where r.grno = #{no} order by ref_dt desc limit 8
select DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') as group_date, avg(cost) as cost from refuel group by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') desc
select grno, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') as group_date, avg(cost) as cost from refuel where grno = #{no} group by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') desc

select r.grno, r.rno, g.mno, Round((r.mile + r.cost/r.lcost * g.effi)) as mile, r.ref_dt, g.effi, o.fuel from refuel r left outer join garage g on r.grno = g.grno left outer join official o on o.mdno = g.mdno where r.grno = #{no} order by ref_dt desc limit 1
